body: The check only applies to the varargs case: e.g. `view(1, 2, 3)`. It doesn't check the tuple case of `view((1, 2, 3))`. In that case we still need to check the contents in the unpack code.
body_html: The check only applies to the varargs case: e.g. view(1, 2, 3). It doesn't check the tuple case of view((1, 2, 3)). In that case we still need to check the contents in the unpack code.
body_text: The check only applies to the varargs case: e.g. view(1, 2, 3). It doesn't check the tuple case of view((1, 2, 3)). In that case we still need to check the contents in the unpack code.
